elements.name: Admin sets Authorization

steps.name: Admin provides valid authentication details

elements.name: Check if Admin able to retrieve all programs with valid Endpoint

Admin receives 200 OK Status with program response body
Admin sets Authorization for class module

Admin sets Authorization for class module

elements.name: Check if admin able to retrieve all class recording without Authorization

steps.name: Admin creates GET Request and sends HTTPS Request with valid endpoint but without Auth for getAllRecordings
Admin receives 401 "Unauthorized" Status for getAllRecordings
Admin sets Authorization for class module
